title: Kettle Cuisine, LLC Recalls Chicken Soup Product Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 12, 2017 Kettle Cuisine, LLC, a Lynn, Mass. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,096 pounds of chicken soup product due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The label declares the product to...
impacted_products: 24 ounce cups containing “MOM’S CHICKEN SOUP” with a “USE BY” date of 02/17/17
